titleStmt.title: The araignment of Iohn Selman, who was executed neere Charing-Crosse the 7. of Ianuary, 1612. for a fellony by him committed in the Kings Chappell at White-Hall vpon Christmas day last, in presence of the King and diuers of the nobility

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. H[all] for Thomas Archer, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Pallace,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
A variant of the edition dated 1611.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
